standard_terms_sections.label: HIPAA/BAA Confidentiality Clause
standard_terms_sections.content: TPCCC is being entrusted with Privileged Health Information (PHI) protected under both Texas and federal HIPAA Privacy Regulations. TPCCC will execute a Business Associate Agreement (BAA) with the Client if that has not already been completed.

standard_terms_sections.label: Credentialing & Malpractice Insurance
standard_terms_sections.content: All TPCCC providers maintain current medical licenses, board certifications, and professional liability insurance as required by applicable state and federal regulations.

standard_terms_sections.label: Dispute Resolution (Mediation)
standard_terms_sections.content: Neither party shall institute a proceeding before any court to resolve any controversy or claim arising out of or relating to this engagement until the parties have sought to resolve the dispute through direct, good faith negotiation. If the dispute is not resolved within thirty (30) days, the parties shall attempt to resolve the dispute through non-binding mediation.
